channel.title: Eotenweard - The Elmet Witch
channel.description:
A session of **Eotenweard**, my PbtA game of Dark Age monster-hunting, run as part of this months **Gauntlet Community Open Gaming (GCOG)** weekend ... a Celtic Christian King needs an unkillable witch, killed ... One of the players got it right when they said ... "I'm sitting here processing how it ended and realised that the most inhuman character (literally a sometimes incorporeal spirit) ended up growing the most as a person, the most human character ended up losing their humanity, the on-the-surface "lighter" cleric slayed the maybe-but-maybe-not a monster in a religious fervour and the on-the-surface "darker" cleric wept for the monster she was sworn to slay. That symmetry in our character arcs is just so satisfying!" It was a great session!
https://youtu.be/Bz2vAwJayQ8
